mapper.select: select userId, nickname, suspendDate, isAdmin from member where userId=#{userId} and userPwd=#{userPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into member(userId, userPwd, userName, userTel, userEmail, birth, nickname, gender, experience, bicycleType) values(#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{birth}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{experience}, #{bicycleType})
